City Council
============

* First and third Tuesday of each month
* City Hall
  215 E. McKinney St.
  Council Chamber
  Denton, TX 76201



1. [2026 City Council Meeting Schedule (PDF)](https://www.cityofdenton.com/DocumentCenter/View/12791/2026-City-Council-Meeting-Schedule-PDF)
2. [City Council District Map (PDF)](https://www.cityofdenton.com/DocumentCenter/View/4843/All-City-Council-Voter-Districts-PDF)

1. [City Council Voting History](https://www.cityofdenton.com/DocumentCenter/Index/287)
2. [City Council Travel Reports](https://www.cityofdenton.com/DocumentCenter/Index/1061)

/QuickLinks.aspx

![Group portrait of all seven City Council members standing in the Courtyard of City Hall](https://www.cityofdenton.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=11837 "Group portrait of all seven City Council members standing in the Courtyard of City Hall")





Regular City Council Meetings and Work Sessions are open to the public. Refer to the posted agenda as the start time of the Work Sessions may vary. Meetings are also available live and on-demand online and are televised live on DTV, the City's government access cable channel (Charter 194, Grande 12, and Verizon 38). Meetings are replayed on DTV Wednesday at 9 a.m., Thursday at 6 p.m., Saturday at 1 p.m., and Monday at 1 a.m.

To view agendas or watch live meetings, visit the
Public Meetings page
.
